predicate.note: Frames file for 'intoxicate' based on sentences in ECTB. VN entry in amuse-31.1 but not same sense.

example.name: transitive
example.text: The performance by more than 40 members of the Rome Philharmonic Orchestra intoxicated the audience and the musical fountain , hi-fi sound effect , fountain screen and stereographic projection brought them to a marvelous world where sound , light and color blended even more [*T*-9] .
example.arg: The performance by more than 40 members of the Rome Philharmonic Orchestra
